resources.app_description: An shirya don Windows, aikace-aikacen Bing yana sa gudanarwa a tafin hannunka. Ko kana son taɓawa da kuma kuma ja ko dannawa da kuma rubutawa, aikace-aikacen Bing yana sa maka shi sauƙi wajen neman bayanin da kake so da kuma kammala muhimman ɗawainiyoyi.
resources.error_argument_null_or_undefined: Null or undefined passed for "{0}" argument
resources.error_invalid_operation: "{0}" operation is invalid within current context
resources.error_relay_blank_message_name: Error while relaying from app to web: msgName was blank.
resources.error_navigation_path: Failed to find view mapping for "{0}"
resources.error_must_override: {0} method must be overriden in derived class
resources.error_unhandled_navigation_uri: Navigation path not handled by iframehost: {0}.
resources.error_view_must_be_loaded: "{0}" must have been loaded by now
resources.error_must_be_loading_view: "{0}" must be in the process of being loaded
resources.error_view_not_registered: "{0}" is not found in view registry
resources.error_page_network_error_message: Ba mu tabbatar da abin da ya faru ba. sake gwadawa bayan ƴan mintoci.
resources.error_error_page_in_app_context: Error page loaded inside app compartment
resources.settings_safesearch_description: Tace ƙunshiyar batsa daga sakamakon nemanka.
resources.settings_safesearch_filter_moderate_desc: Tace hotunan batsa da kuma bidiyoyi daga sakamakon nemanka.
resources.settings_safesearch_filter_off_descripti: Kada a tace ƙunshiya daga sakamakon nemanka.
resources.settings_safesearch_filter_strict_descri: Tace rubutu na batsa, hotuna, da kuma bidiyoyi daga sakamakon nemanka.
resources.settings_searchhistory_clear_description: Lura cewa ba za ka iya fasa wannan ba.
resources.settings_link_feedback: Gaya mana abin da kake tunani
resources.tou_description: Ta danna “amince”, ka yarda da {0} da kuma {1}.
resources.error_navigation_completed_called_before: NavigationManager.notifyNavigationCompleted call must be preceeded by calling NavigationManager.notifyNavigationStarted method
resources.error_navigation_started_called_from_inv: NavigationManager.notifyNavigationStarted can be called only if navigation manager is in idle state
resources.error_navigation_message_payload_must_co: Navigation message posted by web compartment must contain uri
resources.error_unhandled_bing_uri: Bing path not handled by iframehost: {0}.
resources.error_description_restart: Ba mu tabbatar da abin da ya faru ba, amma muna buƙatarka da ka sake kunna aikace-aikacen.
resources.error_description_tryagain: Ba mu tabbatar da abin da ya faru ba. sake gwadawa bayan ƴan mintoci.
resources.error_description_outofdate: Wannan bayanin tsohon yayi ne. Bincika haɗinka na Intanet. Idan yana aiki, sake gwadawa bayan ƴan mintoci.
resources.error_description_entertopic: Shigar da wani suna na wannan batun.
resources.error_description_topicexists: Tuni akwai wannan batu. Shigar da wani sabon suna.
resources.topics_no_items: Ba ka da wasu abubuwa a cikin wannan batu.
resources.topics_search_and_share: Da kake nema da kuma sabun shafukan yanar gizo masu alaka, za ka iya raba su ga wannan batu.
resources.start_already_exists: Tuni akwai wani batu mai ɗauke da wannan suna
resources.start_delete_permanently: Kana son yi wa wannan batu sharewar dindindin?
resources.start_articles: Maƙalu da za a karanta ba
resources.start_set_as_lock: Saita hoto a zaman kulle allo
resources.start_max_topics_reached: Ka kai iyakar adadin batutuwa. Share wasu tsofaffin batutuwa, sannan ka sake gwadawa.
resources.update_version_out_of_date: Sigar aikace-aikacen Bing tsohuwar yayi ce.
resources.update_download: Don zazzage sabuwar sigar, tafi zuwa Shagon Windoes.
resources.trending_error: Kana son ƙarin kanun labarai?  An rufe Aikace-aikacen Labarai na Bing.
